title: Thangalle beliaththa main rode eka asalin
details:
*Ruhunu vijabaya national college eka Pena durin
*Garment ekak asala
*Pol idamak
*Idiwemin pawathina mathara katharagama hight waye ekata 5km
*Idiwemin pawathina mathara katharagama dumriya margaya ta 3km
*Thangalle beliaththa main rode ekata 900m
Niskalanka parisarayaka sundara idamak 30 perach vikinimata atha
